item.title: Adding shop to 317 PI
item.dc:creator: @redrover redrover
item.description:
@redrover wrote:

No, its not…

You used ur “Spacebar”

You should of used “TAB”.

item.title: Adding shop to 317 PI
item.dc:creator: @Ineverbow Ineverbow
item.description:
@Ineverbow wrote:

yes,i know that you have to add them under shops.cfg
this is my shop

shop = 11       Skillcape_Shop  2       2       9747	25	9750	25	9753	25	9756	25	9759	25	9762	25	9765	25	9768	25	9771	25	9774	25	9777	2	9780	25	9783	25	9786	25	9789	25	9792	25	9795	25	9798	25	9801	25	9804	25	9807	25	9810	25	9813	25

everything… seems to be good,dosent it?

Read full topic

item.title: Adding shop to 317 PI
item.dc:creator: @redrover redrover
item.description:
@redrover wrote:

well, to add a new shop or edit another 1 u gotta open up Shops.cfg

it would look like

shop = 1	SHOPNAME					2	2	ITEMID	AMOUNT	ITEMID	AMOUNT

ect.
also don’t forget, all spaces should be done with TAB not spacebar

Read full topic
